docs.lead_paragraph: For decades, farmers have routinely fed antibiotics to livestock to fatten up the animals and protect them from illnesses amplified by confined conditions.

headline.main: Bill Under Debate Would Limit Farm Antibiotics in Oregon
headline.print_headline: Bill Under Debate Would Limit Farm Antibiotics in Oregon

docs.snippet: For decades, farmers have routinely fed antibiotics to livestock to fatten up the animals and protect them from illnesses amplified by confined conditions.

docs.lead_paragraph: The world's leading malaria vaccine candidate appears to be a disappointment, with final study results showing it doesn't work very well and that initial protection fades over time.

headline.main: Malaria Vaccine Is a Letdown but Could Still Reduce Cases
headline.print_headline: Malaria Vaccine Is a Letdown but Could Still Reduce Cases

docs.snippet: The world's leading malaria vaccine candidate appears to be a disappointment, with final study results showing it doesn't work very well and that initial protection fades over time.

docs.lead_paragraph: It’s insane that we spend so much on health care and so little on research.

headline.main: Newt Gingrich: Double the N.I.H. Budget

docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Newt Gingrich deplores how funding for National Institutes for Health has remained stagnant even as government spending on health care has increased significantly; highlights proposals by lawmakers that would encourage research and medical breakthroughs in number of areas; urges Congress to double NIH budget.
docs.snippet: It’s insane that we spend so much on health care and so little on research.
